# Welcome to my Portfolio

This is my personal portfolio, created with a flexible block-based content system. You can create content using a flexible block system including text, and spacers. This powerful feature allows for dynamic and versatile page layouts, all managed through a simple data structure.

## Markdown Rendering

The system can render markdown content from Firestore, supporting various elements like:

- Lists of items
- **Bold** and *italic* text for emphasis
- `inline_code()` snippets for technical details
- [Hyperlinks](https://firebase.google.com) to external resources
- Images from a URL like this one: ![A random image from Unsplash](https://source.unsplash.com/random/800x600)

### GitHub Flavored Markdown

Enjoy extended syntax like tables, strikethrough, and more.

| Feature             | Supported |
| ------------------- | :-------: |
| HTML in Markdown    |    Yes    |
| GFM Tables          |    Yes    |
| Responsive Layouts  |    Yes    |
